result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
result.translation: Ibrahimu yababwiye ati: “Jewe mu vy’ukuri, ndimukiye aho nshobora kwiyegereza Imana yanje Rurema mu vyo nkora vyose ndanayisenga mu mwidegemvyo, Izoheza Inshikane ku vyiza mw’idini no mu buzima bwanje bwo kw’isi”;
